identity.name: Legenddary
identity.tone: Premium, Legendary, Professional, Intuitive, Warm, Earthy

headings.usage: All major headings (H1-H3). Use tracking-tight for sizes > 32px.

editor.usage: The actual book writing content (for readability).

mono.usage: Technical data, ISBN numbers, code snippets.

primary.description: Metallic Gold. Use for primary CTAs and key highlights.

secondary.description: Warm Charcoal. Use for secondary buttons and cards in dark mode.

background.description: Deep Obsidian for Dashboard/Landing. Warm Paper for Editor.

accent.description: Soft Stone. Use for subtle borders and dividers.

destructive.description: Deep Crimson. Use for delete actions.

spacing.philosophy: Generous spacing. Use 2-3x more padding than standard templates.

grids.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode B). Dense, data-correlated, no jagged bottoms.
grids.marketing: Tetris Grid (Mode A). Asymmetric, visual tension, overlapping elements.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-semibold shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(212,175,55,0.3)] transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium border border-white/10

cards.dashboard: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/5 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors
cards.feature: bg-gradient-to-b from-white/5 to-transparent border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-8 hover:shadow-2xl transition-all

inputs.default: bg-background/50 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-lg h-12 px-4

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain overlay on dark backgrounds to prevent banding and add 'paper' feel.

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale slightly on hover. Cards lift (-translate-y-1).
motion.entrance: Staggered fade-in-up for lists and grids.

hero_workspace.alt: Cozy, dimly lit workspace with books and laptop
hero_workspace.usage: Hero section background or feature highlight

library_shelf.usage: About section or 'Your Library' empty state

media.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone) for dashboard. Heroicons for general UI.

libraries.3d: React Three Fiber (for Hero book showcase if needed)

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Premium Dark' theme by default for the Landing Page and Dashboard.
Implement a 'Paper Light' theme toggle specifically for the Book Editor to reduce eye strain.
Use the 'Gold Shimmer' gradient sparingly on primary buttons and key text highlights.
Ensure all borders in dark mode are extremely subtle (white/5 or white/10).
The 'Signature Studio' should feel like a high-end digital canvas.
Do not use default Shadcn cards; customize them with the 'glassmorphism' styles defined above.
For the 'Cover Designer', create a workspace that feels like a professional design tool (dark UI, bright canvas).
Use 'Playfair Display' for all H1-H3 headings to establish the brand voice.
Ensure 'Manrope' is used for all UI text for maximum legibility.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts or default blue/purple gradients.
Use z-index layering to create depth.
Never use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Do not center-align the main app container.
